verses.name: Proverbs 24:8
verses.text: He that deviseth to do evil shall be called a mischievous person.

verses.name: Proverbs 24:9
verses.text: The thought of foolishness is sin: and the scorner is an abomination to men.

verses.name: Proverbs 24:10
verses.text: If thou faint in the day of adversity, thy strength is small.

verses.name: Proverbs 24:11
verses.text: If thou forbear to deliver them that are drawn unto death, and those that are ready to be slain;

verses.name: Proverbs 24:12
verses.text: If thou sayest, Behold, we knew it not; doth not he that pondereth the heart consider it? and he that keepeth thy soul, doth not he know it? and shall not he render to every man according to his works?
